khookguy wrote:

> I'm beginning to incorporate mock objects into my JUnit testing.  Can
> anyone suggest what they think is the "best" mock objects framework for
> use with JUnit?

No, they can't. It's a question of personal taste. In _JUnit Recipes_ I 
used EasyMock, but now I usually use jMock. Try both and form your own 
opinion. I think EasyMock is easier to use, but jMock is more concise.
